Control Name: 5.12.2 No user accounts have long-standing write access to production environments.
Control Statement: Write-access to production systems should be limited to service principals and no user accounts have regular write-access.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 5.12 What security controls do you have in place for access to Azure infrastructure?
